attributes.action: ABOLISH ALL FUEL SUPPLEMENTS ON FLIGHTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a busdriver refused to move until all passengers paid an extra fuel charge on top of their fares we would protest vigourously. On every flight there is now a fuel charge over and above the airfare. We are being charged twice for the same thing!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
